definitions.definition: One of an order of priests among certain groups of Celts before the adoption of Abrahamic religions.
A priest or mage who uses magic based on nature or trees.

main_definition: ( historical ) One of an order of priests among certain groups of Celts before the adoption of Abrahamic religions.
secondary_definitions: ( fantasy , roleplaying games ) A priest or mage who uses magic based on nature or trees.
